<title level="1" pfs="">[Sarkorian Wolf](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2074)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

To survive living in the Worldwound, Sarkorian wolves developed defenses against the [Abyss](/Planes.aspx?ID=13). They've become symbols for Mendevian crusaders who struggled to adapt to the world after the war ended. 

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
